title: This Animal Has a Retractable Anus
description:
Visit http://brilliant.org/scishow/ to get started learning STEM for free, and the first 200 people will get 20% off their annual premium subscription.

Most animals keep their poop chutes on the opposite side of their body from where they eat. But that doesn’t mean it’s always the case, and bryozoans are great examples of how creative you can get with where you put your anus. 

Hosted by: Hank Green

SciShow is on TikTok!  Check us out at https://www.tiktok.com/@scishow

title: This Fish Has a Serious Case of the Blues
description:
Visit http://brilliant.org/scishow/ to get started learning STEM for free, and the first 200 people will get 20% off their annual premium subscription.

There are a lot of brightly colored fish in the world, but lingcod, which are usually brown and white, can sometimes end up quite blue, and not just on the outside.

Hosted by: Hank Green

SciShow is on TikTok!  Check us out at https://www.tiktok.com/@scishow
